pending.title: Account Pending Approval
pending.message: Your account is awaiting approval from an administrator. Please check back later.

main.title: Dashboard
main.subtitle: Your manufacturing empire awaits
main.factoryDescription: Build and manage your production lines
main.marketDescription: Trade goods and manage your economy

factory.title: Factory Overview
factory.zoomHint: Scroll to zoom, drag to pan
factory.dragMaterialsHint: Drag materials from below to fill each slot
factory.notEnoughMaterials: Not enough materials in inventory to build this

exploration.title: Exploration Map
exploration.clickToSelect: Click a tile to view details

admin.title: Administration
admin.confirmDelete: Are you sure you want to delete this user? This action cannot be undone.
admin.confirmRoleChange: Are you sure you want to change this user's role?

error.generic: An error occurred. Please try again.

research.prototypeWorkshopDesc: Build prototypes to unlock discovered recipes for production
research.runExperimentsDesc: Run experiments to discover new recipes
research.noMissingInputs: No missing inputs for your researched recipes
research.noEligibleTargets: No eligible targeted options available yet
research.passiveDiscoveryDesc: Each tick has a small chance to passively discover a new recipe, even without running experiments. Discovered recipes still require prototype building to unlock for production.
research.buildLabsHint: Build Research Laboratories to increase this chance.
research.convertCreditsDesc: Convert credits to Research Points ({{ratio}} credits = 1 RP)
research.insufficientCredits: Not enough credits for this amount.
research.donatePartsDesc: Donate parts for RP (basePrice x ageMultiplier)
research.noDonableItems: No donable items in inventory. Raw materials cannot be donated.
research.runExperimentsToPrototype: Run experiments to discover new recipes and begin prototyping
research.targetedExperimentDesc: Select a specific recipe to research. These are materials needed by recipes you've already discovered or unlocked.
research.allMaterialsResearched: All required materials have already been researched.
research.allTargetsResearched: All eligible targets have already been researched.
research.buildPrototypeHint: Build a prototype in the {{location}} to unlock this recipe.
research.recipeUnlocked: This recipe has been unlocked for production.
research.assignToMachines: You can now assign it to your machines.

tips.factory: Drag machines and generators from the sidebar onto the grid. Click a machine to assign a recipe, or right-click to remove it.
tips.exploration: Click on tiles to see details. Unlock resource nodes to start extracting raw materials automatically.
tips.research: Use Research Points to run experiments and discover new recipes. Build prototypes to unlock recipes for production.
tips.market: Select items from your inventory to sell. Watch market trends and diversify your sales for bonus credits.

factory.title: Welcome to Your Factory
factory.description: This is your factory floor where all production happens. You can place machines to process materials and generators to provide power. Drag machines and generators from the right panel onto the grid to get started.
factory.hint: Tip: Right-click on a machine or generator to remove it. Click on a machine to assign a recipe.

power.title: Power Your Production
power.description: Every machine needs energy to operate. Generators produce energy, while machines consume it. Make sure you have enough generators running to power all your machines, or they won't be able to produce anything!
power.hint: Tip: Watch the energy indicator in the top-right corner. Red means you need more generators!

exploration.title: Explore for Resources
exploration.description: The exploration map reveals resource nodes scattered across the terrain. These nodes automatically extract raw materials like wood, stone, and ore. Unlock nodes to start gathering the materials you need for production.
exploration.hint: Tip: Expand your exploration area to discover more valuable resource nodes.

research.title: Research New Recipes
research.description: Run experiments to discover new recipes for your machines. When you discover a recipe, you'll need to build a prototype to unlock it for regular production. More advanced recipes create higher-value goods!
research.hint: Tip: Donate credits or parts to gain Research Points needed for experiments.

market.title: Sell for Profit
market.description: The market is where you sell your finished goods for credits. Credits are essential for expanding your factory, exploring new areas, and funding research. Watch market trends to maximize your profits!
market.hint: Tip: Diversify what you sell to earn bonus credits. Don't oversaturate any single market!

market.sellMoreTypes: Sell {{count}} more type to unlock +{{bonus}}% bonus
market.sellMoreTypesPlural: Sell {{count}} more types to unlock +{{bonus}}% bonus
market.obsolescenceDesc: Older products lose value as you discover newer technology
market.obsolescenceWarning: Research and produce higher-age goods to maintain profits!
market.marketsSaturated: Many markets are saturated. Consider switching to Age {{age}}+ goods for better prices.
market.focusOnDemand: Focus on producing {{item}} and other high-demand items for maximum profit.
market.marketsStable: Markets are stable. Diversify your production to maintain steady revenue.
market.noFinalGoods: No final goods discovered yet. Research recipes to unlock them!
market.noInventory: No final goods in inventory. Produce some items to sell!
market.whyTheseItems: Shown because they’re in your inventory, trending sharply, or affected by market events.
market.noPriceHistory: Price history will appear after a few ticks.

encyclopedia.title: Recipe Encyclopedia
encyclopedia.selectRecipe: Select a recipe to view details
encyclopedia.noRecipesYet: No recipes discovered yet. Run experiments in the Research tab!
